# Disallow unnecessary semicolons (`no-extra-semi`)

## Rule Details

This rule extends the base [`eslint/no-extra-semi`](https://eslint.org/docs/rules/no-extra-semi) rule.
<<<<<<< HEAD
It adds support for class properties.
